name: Password Reset Alert
subject: Security Alert: Reset Your ${company_name} Password
body_html:
${company_name} Security

Dear ${first_name},

We detected a recent login attempt to your ${company_name} account from an unrecognized device.

If this was not you, your password may be compromised. Please reset your password immediately by clicking the button below:

Reset Password

If you did not request this change, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.

Thank you,
${company_name} Security Team
